price: 14 et tous les habitants de la terre, afin d’être sauvé.
arabic: وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: waman fī al-arḍi jamīʿan thumma yunjīhi
